attributes.action: Simply benefits and taxation through proactive assistance
attributes.additional_details: I would like to be able to enter my personal details into a government website, similar to a self assessment tax return, and be informed of which taxations apply, and which benefits I am eligible for. I would then like to be able to apply online, if applicable. As my circumstances change, and as taxation rules and policies change, I would like to be informed as to how I will be affected. I would like to be able to see my working history, national insurance contributions, income tax, etc. displayed through a single interface. Future expansion could include access to my own medical records, which can be shared with this system for added information on disabilities, etc.
